p: The MIC value in the present study ranged from 0.4 μl to 12.5 μl. Pg and Pi showed the least value for MIC, i.e., 0.4 μl whereas Fn and A. actinomycetemcomitans were found to be sensitive at 12.5 μl and 0.8 μl. The time-kill curve which demonstrates the bactericidal activity of shiitake mushroom showed absolute no growth of Pg and Fn whereas Pi and A. actinomycetemcomitans showed a gradual decrease in the growth.
